    Builder for Manifest.

    • Method Detail

      • addFileWithTargetDirectory

        DownloadService.Manifest.Builder addFileWithTargetDirectory(java.net.URI sourceFileUri,
                                                            java.io.File targetDirectory)
        Add a source file specifying a target directory. The filename for the target is computed by using the last component of the resource path.
        Parameters:
        sourceFileUri - source URISi
        targetDirectory - target directory
        Returns:
        a builder for chaining

      • addFileWithTargetFile

        DownloadService.Manifest.Builder addFileWithTargetFile(java.net.URI sourceFileUri,
                                                       java.io.File targetFile)
        Add a source file specifying a target file destination.
        Parameters:
        sourceFileUri - source URI
        targetFile - target file
        Returns:
        a builder for chaining

      • build

        DownloadService.Manifest build()
        Build the manifest.
        Returns:
        the manifest
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if two or more source URIs point to the same target file
